channel.description: Setting up RHEL8 VM1 download the disk iso on Redhat’s website Name RHEL8-VM1 accept defaults set drive to 10 gigs press “space” to halt autoboot Select install select language configure timezone under time & date go into installation destination and click “done” Network and hostname settings change the hostname to server1.example.com go to IPv4 settings in network and host and set to manual address: 192.168.0.110 netmask 24 gateway 192.168.0.1 then save
